title: Pracvtise tool is awesome, but one little thing is missing:
body:
You should be able to pick all champions and all Skins in Practise mode. 

Its just a single player mode anyway, you will never be able to play with people, so it would be the ideal way to preview skins you want to buy or test a champion you wnat to get.

replies.body: You should definitely be able to play as every champion in it. Every game with a practice mode does it, and in league specially you really need to actually play a champion to be able to fight against them. It's not reasonable to be expected to pay for a champion that we don't actually like or want just to be able to play AGAINST them.
didnt even think about that, but you are right.
and be able to skip more time ,not 30s ,which we see and add more bots or players ,not only 1
How about mobile dummies with a programmable path?
hmmm that would be neat too.
